content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)

### Iron plate storage at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position (43.5, -82.5) with inventory {'coal': 71}
-  Chest at position (40.5, -80.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position (43.5, -81.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position (-16.5, -49.5) with inventory {'iron-ore': 115}
-  Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position (0.5, 2.5) with empty inventory

### Lab at position unknown
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) with fuel {'coal': 44} and pickup position (4.5, 0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) with fuel {'coal': 42} and pickup position (0.5, 4.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using steam engines but having no input liquid
-  Make sure to provide the required liquid to the steam engine before using it
### Errors when using offshore pumps but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that the offshore pump has the required fluid connections before using it
### Errors when using labs but having no power
-  Make sure to provide power to the lab before using it
